name: Amazon All Dark
description: I wasnt satisfied with the top few Dark themes for Amazon. They all did good things, but here I've combined them. From reduced banners to increased font sizes and dark backgrounds, it's all good things.
additional_info:
changed user menu to be all black, removed white column and border. Redid home page for black between various categories. 2017/11/30
added orange pricing to wish lists, black to table headers in item info and initial search results. 2018/01/09
Prime menu area to black. 2018/02/23
Got pricing options box back to black, removed gray on "a-sized-base" to allow more readable original color through. 2018/04/05
Hud dashboard is now black as is "recommended items" page. 2018/05/02
Found some black on black on product pages. 2018/06/06
Re-skinned new front page. 2018/09/09

discussions.name: Works better than other options on AWS documentation pages
Prices and a few other text items are not visible
